main event: A circular object with yellow and red flames was observed on a straight course to the NNW at low speed at an estimated altitude of 10,000 ft by civilian observers in Gate City, Virginia on January 7th, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed to have yellow and red flames from both ends.
It was moving at a low speed and on a straight course to the NNW.
The estimated altitude of the object was 10,000 ft.
The observation was made by civilian observers.
There was a whirring noise associated with the object.
sighted object: circular object with yellow and red flames
